Name: 3D Jigsaw Puzzle Simulator
About the game: With this demo of the game, you can plunge into the world of jigsaw puzzles assembly as in real life to classical music on a nice looking levels. The game has: - Upload your own picture for assembly - 3 levels to build - Assembly timer - Hints: flip all pieces and find adjacent pieces - Control with keyboard and mouse - Educational level - Hiding and showing the interface - Manipulation of puzzle pieces on any surface
